amendment.description: Relative to the measurement of highway mileage for purposes of determining eligibility for essential air service subsidies.

vote.text: Amendment SA 915 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 915 proposed by Senator Specter. (consideration: CR S7805-7806; text: CR S7805-7806) Relative to the measurement of highway mileage for purposes of determining eligibility for essential air service subsidies.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 915 proposed by Senator Specter.
